definition: To allocate one's time, effort, or attention to a specific person, activity, or cause, often with a sense of dedication or devotion. It is commonly used when referring to the act of dedicating oneself to a particular task, project, or individual.

examples.german: Ich widme meine Zeit der Familie.
examples.english: I dedicate my time to my family.

examples.german: Er widmete sein Leben der Wissenschaft.
examples.english: He devoted his life to science.
She dedicated a poem to him.

examples.german: Wir widmen diesen Erfolg unseren Mitarbeitern.
examples.english: We dedicate this success to our employees.

examples.german: Der Autor widmete sein Buch seiner Mutter.
examples.english: The author dedicated his book to his mother.
